text: "The Glamorous Life" is a 1984 song written by Prince, recorded by Sheila E. The Glamorous Life may also refer to: * The Glamorous Life (album), an album by Sheila E. * The Glamorous Life (Desperate Housewives), an episode of the television series Desperate Housewives * Glamorous Life (album), a 2017 album by Junko Onishi * "The Glamorous Life", a song by Stephen Sondheim from the musical A Little Night Music
title: The Glamorous Life (disambiguation)
